ygData.subject: Re: IGL Reg. - Reptilica VS Dark Penguin
ygData.msgSnippet: Dark Penguin looked around, and absorbed the atmosphere, with the strange alien crowd looking on him. He took a deep breath in, the air rushing into him,

Subject: Re: IGL Reg. - Reptilica VS Dark Penguin

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Dark Penguin looked around, and absorbed the atmosphere, with the
strange alien crowd looking on him. He took a deep breath in, the air
rushing into him, feeling him with exillaration, as his shoulders rose.
He quickly pulled out his stun gun, and fired off a blast at Reptilica.
